data.name: Tech Community Day - 2020
data.description: Tech community day is a free virtual conference, where community and industry leaders collaborate with each other to deliver two days full of free technical learning.

relatedRecords.name: AsyncAPI Online Conference
relatedRecords.description: It all started like a crazy idea. Since we’re all confined at home due to the coronavirus pandemic, why not organizing a fully-remote online conference to meet each other and have some fun? We asked the community and the response was overwhelmingly positive. We had no choice! Time for some action!

relatedRecords.description: Wie können die Möglichkeiten des digitalen Wandels Hochschulbildung bereichern - und zwar auf allen Ebenen? Wie verändert sich nicht nur Lehren und Lernen, sondern die Hochschule als institutionelles System? Diese Fragen stellt das University:Future Festival - Learning and Systems in a Digital Socie…
